## Tender Description
The Wasauksing Swing Bridge Structural Rehabilitation project involves the rehabilitation of the Wasauksing Swing Bridge located in Parry Sound, ON. The contract is expected to commence on 2023-05-05 and end on 2023-07-28. The procurement method is an Advance Contract Award Notice, and the contract is to be awarded exclusively to the selected contractor. 

Please note that this tender is cancelled.
